unit_test::make_suite_info

Convenience for producing suite_info for a given test type.

Synopsis

Defined in header <boost/beast/_experimental/unit_test/suite_info.hpp> 

template<
    class Suite>
suite_info
make_suite_info(
    std::string name,
    std::string module,
    std::string library,
    bool manual);
